Posts.Content: Hi all. Iv been getting lip fillers for years now but ever since I got diagnosed back in December I haven’t been able too and now my lips look like a deflated bloon. I finished my radiation and Capecitabine 6 weeks ago now and I know I’m allowed to dye my hair but am I allowed lip filler?? I don’t want to have a reaction to the Chemotherapy pills or radiation and end up looking like something out of a horror movie.  Samantha xx
Posts.Title: Is it safe to have lip filler 6 weeks after I finished my radiotherapy...
